info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 3:22AM MDT until May 12 at 3:45AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 AM MDT FOR EASTERN CORSON COUNTY... At 321 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over northern Lake Oahe, or 14 miles southeast of Fort Yates, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Wakpala, Indian Memorial Rec Area, Mahto, Grand River Casino and Kenel. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
